en.metaDescription: Copy and paste confused or shrugging emojis 🤷‍♀️🤦‍♂️🤷 from the largest collection of confused and exasperated emoticons. One-click copy for all your expressions of confusion!
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of whyyy emojis! Copy and paste 🤷‍♀️🤦‍♂️ and more confused emojis with one click.
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy a diverse collection of 'whyyy' emojis for your messages and social media.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for 'whyyy' emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect emoticon for any moment of confusion or exasperation.
en.emojiMeaningContent: These emojis often express confusion, a lack of knowledge, or a sense of 'I don't know.' They can be used to indicate helplessness or to simply shrug off a situation. The 🤦‍♀️ and 🤦‍♂️ emojis, on the other hand, represent extreme embarrassment, frustration, or disappointment, often in response to someone doing something foolish or when something has gone wrong.
en.usageScenariosContent: These emojis are commonly used in daily chats to respond to a question you don't know the answer to, to express confusion about a situation, or to show a noncommittal attitude. For example: 'Why did he do that? 🤷‍♀️' or 'I can't believe he said that 🤦‍♂️'.
en.historyContent: The 'shrug' emoji (shruggie) began as a text emoticon ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ before it became an official emoji. The 'facepalm' emoji is also a popular gesture expressing frustration or embarrassment, and its emoji form came later.
en.funStoriesContent: The 'shruggie' emoticon has a long history in internet culture and has been a staple in forums and social media for years, even before it was officially added to Unicode. Its simple, universal meaning has made it incredibly popular. The 'facepalm' gesture is also widely recognized and has become a go-to reaction for moments of exasperation.

zh.metaDescription: 复制和粘贴困惑或耸肩的表情符号 🤷‍♀️🤦‍♂️🤷 来自最大的困惑和恼火表情符号集合。一键复制所有表达你困惑的表情！
zh.ogDescription: 最全的'whyyy'表情符号集合！一键复制和粘贴🤷‍♀️🤦‍♂️以及更多困惑的表情。
zh.exploreDescription: 探索和复制各种“whyyy”表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.footerDescription: 您的'whyyy'表情符号终极资源。发现、复制和分享任何困惑或恼火时刻的完美表情。
zh.emojiMeaningContent: 这些表情符号通常表达困惑、不知情或“我不知道”的感觉。它们可以用来表示无助，或者只是对某种情况不屑一顾。🤦‍♀️和🤦‍♂️表情则表示极度的尴尬、沮丧或失望，通常是由于某人做了愚蠢的事情或某事出了问题。
zh.usageScenariosContent: 在日常聊天中，这些表情符号通常用于回应你不知道答案的问题，表达对某个情况的困惑，或者表现出不置可否的态度。例如：“他为什么那么做？🤷‍♀️”或“我简直不敢相信他说了那句话 🤦‍♂️”。
zh.historyContent: 耸肩表情（shruggie）在成为官方表情符号之前，最初是作为文本表情符号 `¯\_(ツ)_/¯` 在网络上流行起来的。而捂脸表情（facepalm）也是一种流行的手势，表达沮丧或尴尬，其表情符号形式在后来被加入。
zh.funStoriesContent: “耸肩”表情在互联网文化中有着悠久的历史，多年来一直是论坛和社交媒体上的必备元素，甚至在它被正式添加到Unicode之前。它简单而普遍的含义使其变得非常流行。而“捂脸”手势也得到了广泛认可，已成为表达绝望时刻的首选反应。
